issue.title: [CF 1333] DR Fist of Fury
issue.body:
Hello!

For some reason fist of fury stun does not "refresh" the DR. Can you fix it? I'm also curious how I can add this manually in the list. Where is it in the .lua files if I may ask?


> Posted by CurseForge user daniel1992 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1333 | Raw

comments.body:
Please don't ignore the ticket template.

If you want to add it yourself, just tack it on to the end of the list of spells being tracked by the icon.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
